## Documentation Issue

### Location

Which document needs improvement?

- [ ] README.md
- [ ] CONTRIBUTING.md
- [ ] Issue templates
- [ ] Other: ___________

### Issue Description

A clear and concise description of what's wrong or what's missing in the documentation.

## Suggested Improvement

How do you think we should improve the documentation?

## Context

Why is this improvement important? Who would benefit from it?

## Checklist

- [ ] I have checked the latest version of the documentation
- [ ] I have clearly described the issue
- [ ] I have provided suggestions for improvement
